long_description: Lightweight yet durable, the MSR Alpine Nesting Bowl makes campsite cooking and eating a cinch. When bought in multiples they nest inside each other for easy packing and storage. Stainless steel is lightweight, easy to clean and resists rust. MSR Alpine Nesting Bowl weighs a mere 3 oz.
short_description: Lightweight yet durable, the MSR Alpine Nesting Bowl makes campsite cooking and eating a cinch. When bought in multiples they nest inside each other for easy packing and storage.
